message.value: To configure the list of channels of the mumble server
To add a channel to the mumble server
Cannot add a channel, the channel name is missing
Cannot add channel %s, this channel already exists
The channel %s has been added
To remove a channel from the mumble server
All channels have been removed from the mumble server
Cannot remove the channel %s, this channel does not exists
No channel has been removed
The channel %s has been removed from the mumble server
Channels %s have been removed from the mumble server
To rename a channel
Cannot rename a channel, the channel name is missing
Cannot rename channel %s, the new channel name is missing
Cannot rename channel %s as %s, this channel already exists
Cannot rename channel %s, this channel does not exist
The channel %s has been renamed as %s
To modify the stereo signal volume when players speak
Cannot set the sound modifier of a channel, the channel name is missing
Cannot set the sound modifier of channel %s, this channel does not exist
Cannot set the sound modifier of channel %s, the sound modifier name is missing
Cannot set the sound modifier of channel %s, the sound modifier %s does not exist
The channel %s has now %s as sound modifier
To display the characteristics of all channels
There is no registered channel
Characteristics of channels :%n%s
